title: She Overheard Murder
description: On October 29, 1945, Nic Owen made her debut appearance as a radio detective on the new show, Inez Ingalls, Private Eye. Her career began only a few weeks earlier when she was hired to read ad copy and work as an understudy. The murder of Carolyn Park propelled Nic to the starring role and a top spot on the list of suspects. Cecil Park, husband of the murdered woman, wants answers. As does Nora Hahn, Carolyn's 'special friend' for fourteen years. 'She Overheard Murder' introduces characters from the new Nic and Nora Mystery series, mysteries solved by lesbian amateur detectives in post-World War II Chicago.
author: Jean Sheldon
